title: Inquiry about April Fool skins
body:
Hi all! 
I am just wondering if the skins featured in this years April Fool's/Draven Day event are going to eventually be permanent or limited or legacy.
I am not sure if this has been mentioned in a previous discussion; if so, please could you link me! :D
Thank you for your help,

replies.body: Draven Draven is legacy and will retire to the vault on the 12th (i think its the 12th anyway), as for the rest I'm pretty sure they are permanent for now.
Oh ok, thank you very much for replying! I appreciate it ^^
No worries man, I'm real careful to get the legacy skins when they are available too.
